items.sentence: The work will take anywhere from two to three weeks.
This is the most beautiful beach in the whole world.
If I were Tom, I would\'ve punched Mary in the face.

Tom saw the newspaper on the floor and picked it up.
Tom spoke loud enough to be heard in the other room.
Tom will be back in Boston by the middle of October.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all in the same class.
I don\'t like carrots, so I don\'t usually eat them.
Nothing would make me happier than to see you happy.
One of the people you were with is a friend of mine.
Good words are worth a lot, but cost almost nothing.

Tom didn\'t know that Mary knew how to speak French.

I gave some of my old clothes to the Salvation Army.
